column6: After Partner's 2C opening, we respond with the ______. This point count system must be ______.
In our "2C response system", 2D shows ______ HCP, 2H shows ______, and 2S shows ______.
In our "2C response system", a 2NT response shows ______ HCP
2C opener is game forcing unless responder first bids _____, then rebids _____.
The 2C opener should show her real ______ on her rebid, or ______ if balanced and 22-24 HCP.
After no natural Club bid and a natural NT bid,  a bid (especially a jump bid) of ___ is the Gerber convention, ______ asking.
After a 4C Gerber bid, a bid of _____ shows one ace.
If there has been no natural NoTrump bid, a bid of ______ is the Blackwood convention, ______ asking.
After 4NT, a 5D bid shows ______ aces. After 4NT, a 5S bid shows ______ aces.
After 4NT and response showing Aces, a bid of ______ asks "How many Kings?".
We do not use the artificial bid ______, which is a response to 1 of a major showing opening HCP and 4+ support.
We do not use the artificial bid ______, which is a response to 1 of a major showing opening HCP and 4+ support.
We do not use the artificial bid ______, which is a response to 1 of a major showing opening HCP and 4+ support.
We do not use the artificial bid ______, which is a response to 1 of a major showing opening HCP and 4+ support.
We do not use the artificial bid ______, which is a response to 1 of a major showing opening HCP and 4+ support.
A cuebid over a minor suit opening is _______, so {1D} - 2D really shows diamonds.
For a cuebid over opponent's major suit opening we follow the ______ convention.
What does the Michaels Cuebid convention indicate?
The artificial bidding sequence {1H} - 2H shows 5+ ______ and a biddable ______ suit.
What is the minimum strength required for a Michaels Cuebid?
In ______ defense, you try to get tricks quickly. Play honors early before declarer can discard losers.
In ______ defense, hold on to honors to block declarer from extra tricks. Declarers don't like this defense!
The First Law of Defense is do NOT promote tricks in the ______, especially in passive defense.
The Second Law of Defense is lead to ______, especially with dummy on your right and passive defense.
There are certainly exceptions but the standard play is second hand ______ and third hand ______.
